Cingular: We Made Apple Bend

12 January 2007

Cingular: We Made Apple Bend. Or so says Cingular spokeperson and president of national distibution, Glenn Lurie. He goes onto call those who unlock GSM phones “bad guys”, and bad mouth small businesses. Somebody from AT&T (not Cingular, right, guys?) better shut this guy up.
